程序包 net.minecraftforge.event.entity.living

类 LivingSpawnEvent.CheckSpawn

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraftforge.fml.common.eventhandler.Event
      • net.minecraftforge.event.entity.EntityEvent
        • net.minecraftforge.event.entity.living.LivingEvent
          • net.minecraftforge.event.entity.living.LivingSpawnEvent
            • net.minecraftforge.event.entity.living.LivingSpawnEvent.CheckSpawn
  • 封闭类:
    LivingSpawnEvent
    public static class LivingSpawnEvent.CheckSpawn
extends LivingSpawnEvent
    Fires before mob spawn events. Result is significant: DEFAULT: use vanilla spawn rules ALLOW: allow the spawn DENY: deny the spawn

    • 嵌套类概要

      构造器 说明

      Use CheckSpawn(EntityLiving, World, float, float, float, MobSpawnerBaseLogic) instead
      CheckSpawn​(net.minecraft.entity.EntityLiving entity, net.minecraft.world.World world, float x, float y, float z, boolean isSpawner)
      已过时。
      Use {@link CheckSpawn##CheckSpawn(EntityLiving, World, float, float, float, MobSpawnerBaseLogic)} with a spawner instance, or null if not a spawner CheckSpawn is fired when an Entity is about to be spawned.
      CheckSpawn​(net.minecraft.entity.EntityLiving entity, net.minecraft.world.World world, float x, float y, float z, net.minecraft.tileentity.MobSpawnerBaseLogic spawner)
      CheckSpawn is fired when an Entity is about to be spawned.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • CheckSpawn

        public CheckSpawn​(net.minecraft.entity.EntityLiving entity,
                  net.minecraft.world.World world,
                  float x,
                  float y,
                  float z,
                  @Nullable
                  net.minecraft.tileentity.MobSpawnerBaseLogic spawner)
        CheckSpawn is fired when an Entity is about to be spawned.
        参数:
        entity - the spawning entity
        world - the world to spawn in
        x - x coordinate
        y - y coordinate
        z - z coordinate
        spawner - position of the MobSpawner null if it this spawn is coming from a WorldSpawner

      • CheckSpawn

        @Deprecated
public CheckSpawn​(net.minecraft.entity.EntityLiving entity,
                  net.minecraft.world.World world,
                  float x,
                  float y,
                  float z,
                  boolean isSpawner)
        已过时。
        Use {@link CheckSpawn##CheckSpawn(EntityLiving, World, float, float, float, MobSpawnerBaseLogic)} with a spawner instance, or null if not a spawner CheckSpawn is fired when an Entity is about to be spawned.
        参数:
        entity - the spawning entity
        world - the world to spawn in
        x - x coordinate
        y - y coordinate
        z - z coordinate
        isSpawner - true if this spawn is done by a MobSpawner, false if it this spawn is coming from a WorldSpawner

      • CheckSpawn

        @Deprecated
public CheckSpawn​(net.minecraft.entity.EntityLiving entity,
                  net.minecraft.world.World world,
                  float x,
                  float y,
                  float z)
        已过时。
        Use CheckSpawn(EntityLiving, World, float, float, float, MobSpawnerBaseLogic) instead
